info.title: Azure Schema Registry
info.description: Azure Schema Registry is as a central schema repository, complete with support for versioning, management, compatibility checking, and RBAC.

get.summary: Get a registered schema by its unique ID reference.
get.description: Gets a registered schema by its unique ID.  Azure Schema Registry guarantees that ID is unique within a namespace.

parameters.name: schema-id
parameters.description: References specific schema in registry namespace.

Location.description: URL location of schema, identified by schema group, schema name, and version.

Serialization-Type.description: Serialization type for the schema being stored.

Schema-Id.description: References specific schema in registry namespace.

Schema-Id-Location.description: URL location of schema, identified by schema ID.

schema.description: String representation (UTF-8) of the registered schema.

default.description: An error response received from the Azure Schema Registry service.

post.description: Gets the ID referencing an existing schema within the specified schema group, as matched by schema content comparison.

parameters.name: group-name
parameters.description: Schema group under which schema is registered.  Group's serialization type should match the serialization type specified in the request.

parameters.name: Serialization-Type
parameters.description: Serialization type for the schema being registered.

parameters.name: schema-content
parameters.description: String representation (UTF-8) of the registered schema.

Location.description: URL location of schema, identified by schema group, schema name, and version.

Serialization-Type.description: Serialization type for the schema being stored.

Schema-Id.description: References specific schema in registry namespace.

Schema-Id-Location.description: URL location of schema, identified by schema ID.

default.description: An error response received from the Azure Schema Registry service.

put.description: Register new schema. If schema of specified name does not exist in specified group, schema is created at version 1. If schema of specified name exists already in specified group, schema is created at latest version + 1.

parameters.name: group-name
parameters.description: Schema group under which schema should be registered.  Group's serialization type should match the serialization type specified in the request.

parameters.name: Serialization-Type
parameters.description: Serialization type for the schema being registered.

parameters.name: schema-content
parameters.description: String representation (UTF-8) of the schema being registered.

Location.description: URL location of schema, identified by schema group, schema name, and version.

Serialization-Type.description: Serialization type for the schema being registered.

Schema-Id.description: References specific schema in registry namespace.

Schema-Id-Location.description: URL location of schema, identified by schema ID.

default.description: An error response received from the Azure Schema Registry service.

SchemaId.description: JSON Object received from the registry containing schema identifiers.

id.description: Schema ID that uniquely identifies a schema in the registry namespace.

ServiceErrorResponse.description: Error response returned from Azure Schema Registry service.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: Schema Registry service API version that should be used.

Endpoint.name: endpoint
Endpoint.description: The Schema Registry service endpoint, for example my-namespace.servicebus.windows.net.
